attributes.action: Make Jon West the ing of England, because he would be good.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The current monarchy is at a state of stale, squalid rot. The only option is to make Jon West the King of England. He lives in Hounslow and so is in touch with the real populous.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
